Text:
Why does this have to be in frigging APE format!?

Now I have to go through all of this and convert it.

Thanks, I guess....


everyone else check out http://www.avp-r.com

@AMD_Dk: Yeah of course it's not a movie. It's the soundtrack. LOL.
@zerothdegree: if you don't want perfect quality sound like APE, you have to take your time to convert it to 0.1kbps mp3. What a pity. If you wanna convert to FLAC, then nevermind.

I go with ape and flac. Never had much use for mp3, but for James Horner Glory I had no other choice and I'm even missing 2 themes. Anyone knows of it in flac or ape or whatever format that is complete??
